sentence: The hotel itself was more of a business oriented than a tourist hotel lots of airline crews which was perfect no noisy kids running around in the halls really nice bar lounge great breakfast with a LOT of food options even Asian food
Lovely aromatic smell every where in the hotel facilities
The welcome at reception was excellent excellent service excellent information given
Room amenities were available and of good quality
Very comfortable accommodations and friendly staff
It was very good the reception staff were so helpful and full of recommendations of where to eat and how to get where particularly the two girls one had her hair in a bun
Very friendly reception and given all information needed with maps as well Fod excellent very clean rooms loved my stay would return as very safe area and metro so near by

We needed a driver to a hotel near the airport and we were referred to Max who met us in the lobby carried our luggage drove us and even went with us into the next hotel to make sure that our reservation was in order
Good accommodation with friendly helpful staff
They took advantage of the gym and sauna
Hotel is lovely except for the gym is way too small with 3 or 4 people at in there it is busy
A simple table somewhere in a crowdy entrance

nice place to stay with family but I was chocked when they ask me about taking 180 € That mean 90 € each night before entering my room that put me down little bit but apart from that it is nice place slots of facility Because no body told me about it
The lobby and the whole area is under reconstruction
I asked the clerk in the lobby when the refirbish would be done and he answered in a year or two
For the past year or so the hotel has been renovating its lobby
Again no signs to indicate where the elevators are
I walked around the whole hotel without finding any signage towards the entrance a small Arrow with entrance would have helped
Some renovation could be done to match the cool lobby reception area

You can buy ten one way tickets at one time 149 euros but the elevators often stop you have to climb the stairs only the 14th line and one day stopped for a few hours which has caused us to go for a long time
C the hotel management needs to ditch the bogus environmental agenda and give guests the facility to cool down
However the lobby staff should be very standard
Nothing was too much trouble for all the reception staff from helping with sight seeing bookings to providing umbrellas on a rainy day and booking taxis first class
What made it worse was the fact we later found out she was the manager supervisor of the cafe area in the foyer
